description: A research team accelerates stretchable technology commercialization with world's first visualization of serpentine structures.
title: Unveil the secret of stretchable technology through color

description: A new method of scanning lungs is able to show in real time how air moves in and out of the lungs as people take a breath in patients with asthma, chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD), and patients who have received a lung transplant. It enables experts to see the functioning of transplanted lungs and could enable medics to identify sooner any decline in lung function.
title: New scan method unveils lung function secrets
